entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 24.
